title: How 'Bharat ke veer' helps to army? - Quora

response.answer_text: Bharat Ke Veer is a fund-raising initiative by the Ministry of Home Affairs, It allows donations of up to ₹ 15 lakhs to an individual's account. many of them surely gives the donation as all we India surely loves our country. Its also started Android App as you know best more than me. :-) As the initiative will also be from Akshay Kumar the great indian hero (as per my choice), It will surely rise for good initiate of human being
